Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Baggy \Bag"gy\, a. Resembling a bag; loose or puffed out, or pendent, like a bag; flabby; as, baggy trousers; baggy cheeks. [1913 Webster]
baggy adj : not fitting closely; hanging loosely; "baggy trousers"; "a loose-fitting blouse is comfortable in hot weather" [syn: {loose-fitting}] [also: {baggiest}, {baggier}]
